landing.noapp: You don't need an app to use {{ BRAND }} on your phone or tablet! The web site works great on mobile.
landing.intro: {{BRAND}} ({{TRANSLITERATION}}) is a great way to meet new friends. When you use {{ BRAND }}, we pick someone else at random and let you talk one-to-one. To help you stay safe, chats are anonymous unless you tell someone who you are (not recommended!), and you can stop a chat any time. See our  <1>Terms and conditions</1>, and <2>Community guidelines</2> for info about de do's and don'ts in using {{ BRAND }}. {{ BRAND }} video chat is AI moderated but no moderation is perfects. Users are solely responsible for their behaviour while using {{ BRAND }}
landing.disclaimer: You must be 18 (or the legal majority in your jurisdiction) or older to use {{BRAND}}. See {{BRAND}} <2>Terms and conditions for more info. Parental control protections that may assists parents are commercially available and you can find more info at <3>https://www.connectsafely.org/controls as well are other sites.
landing.pleaseleave: Please leave Lamdazle and visit an adult site instead if that's what you are looking for and you are 18 (or the legal majority in your jurisdiction) or older.
landing.termscheck: By checking the box you acknowledge that you have reviewed an agree to be bound by {{BRAND}}'s <1>Terms and conditions</1>, <2>Privacy policy</2> and <3>Community guidelines</3>.
landing.agecheck: You may not use this service if you are under the age of 18 or the age of legal majority in your jurisdiction. See our <1>Terms and conditions for more info. By checking the box you acknowledge and represent that you are 18 years (or the legal majority in your jurisdiction) or older.
